tombstone.name: Publius Oppius
tombstone.inscription:
P(ublius) Oppi[us, son of...], of (the tribe of) Camilia, ...cio, of Ravenna, soldier of the Legio V
n="5">5 Macedonica, (of the rank of) optio, lived 30 years, served in the army nine years (and) is buried here. (His) heir made (this tombstone)
